titles.title: Take the Name of Jesus with You

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: Take the name of Jesus with you, Child of sorrow and of woe,; It will joy and comfort give you, Take it, then, where’er you go.

verse.name: c
verse.lines: Precious name, O how sweet! Hope of earth and joy of Heav’n; Precious name, O how sweet! Hope of earth and joy of Heav’n.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: Take the name of Jesus ever, As a shield from ev'ry snare; If temptations round you gather, Breathe that holy name in prayer.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: O the precious name of Jesus! How it thrills our souls with joy, When His loving arms receive us, And His songs our tongues employ!

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: At the name of Jesus bowing, Falling prostrate at His feet, King of kings in Heav’n we’ll crown Him, When our journey is complete.
